verses.name: Genesis 6:12
verses.text: And God looked upon the earth, and, behold, it was corrupt; for all flesh had corrupted his way upon the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 6:13
verses.text: And God said unto Noah, The end of all flesh is come before me; for the earth is filled with violence through them; and, behold, I will destroy them with the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 6:14
verses.text: Make thee an ark of gopher wood; rooms shalt thou make in the ark, and shalt pitch it within and without with pitch.
